pymor.playground.discretizers package¶

Submodules¶

numpylistvectorarray module¶

pymor.playground.discretizers.numpylistvectorarray.convert_to_numpy_list_vector_array(m)[source]¶

Use NumpyListVectorArrayMatrixOperator instead of NumpyMatrixOperator.

This simple function converts linear, affinely decomposed models to use NumpyListVectorArrayMatrixOperator instead of NumpyMatrixOperator.
